venue.name: The Hartford Financial Services Group Plaza

item.description:
This is the 25th anniversary Walk Against Hunger and we hope you can join us to make it the biggest and best Walk ever!

You can sign up online by doing the following:
--Go to www.foodshare.org
--Click on the Walk Against Hunger logo
--Click on "join us"
--Fill out the walker registration page (be sure to remember your user name and password so you can come back later to check progress!)
--Click on "join an existing team" and look for "Gloria's Glorious Gang"

Now you can create your own personal web page as part of the event and use it to send e-mails out to friends and family asking them to support you, which they can do right on the web site with a credit card.

You can also raise money the old fashioned way with checks and cash. If you need a paper brochure, send me an e-mail with your snail mail address and I'll get one out to you!

Any questions, feel free to e-mail me through the site.

The Gloria's Glorious Gang team will be made up of a mixture of Tall Club friends, Hiking and other Meetup friends, and other friends and family. I hope you will join us!

Gloria
item.how_to_find_us: "Go to the registration table first and sign in and then look for us on the hill between registration and the parking lot."
item.why: With every $30 raised, Foodshare can provide enough food for a hungry person for an entire month! If you can raise $600, the Chase Family Foundations will match it, doubling your money!
item.name: Walk Against Hunger
